name: MD2WP
description: Publishes a markdown file to WordPress.
author: Moonspace Labs, LLC
helpMarkDown: Publishes a markdown file to WordPress.

inputs.name: wpUrl
inputs.label: WordPress URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL for the destination WordPress site.

inputs.name: wpUserName
inputs.label: WordPress User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name used to sign in to WordPress. It is recommended that you use a hidden variable to provide this value.

inputs.name: wpPassword
inputs.label: WordPress Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password used to sign in to WordPress. It is recommended that you use a hidden variable to provide this value.

inputs.name: vstsMetadataFile
inputs.label: Mapping File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the mapping file used to track information related to each published markdown file.

inputs.name: embedExternalImages
inputs.label: Embed External Images
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, external images (images source from outside VSTS) will be embedded as Base64-encoded data; Otherwise, external images will simply be linked to.

inputs.name: vstsToken
inputs.label: VSTS Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Personal Access Token used to access the VSTS project containing the markdown files to be published.
